<p><a data-i13n="cpos:1;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/amazon-prime-day/">October Prime Day</a> will <a data-i13n="cpos:2;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/deals/amazon-prime-day-dates-revealed-prime-big-deal-days-is-back-on-october-7-and-8-050552812.html">be here soon</a> on October 7 and 8, but as to be expected, you can already find some decent sales available now. Amazon always has lead-up sales in the days and weeks before Prime Day, and it’s wise to shop early if you’re on the hunt for something specific and you see that item at a good discount.<br><br>Prime Day deals are typically reserved for subscribers, but there are always a few that anyone can shop. We expect this year to be no exception, and we’re already starting to see that trend in these early Prime Day deals. These are the best Prime Day deals you can get right now ahead of the event, and we’ll update this post with the latest offers as we get closer to October Prime Day proper.</p> 
<h2 id="jump-link-best-prime-day-deals-early-sales-to-shop-now">Best Prime Day deals: Early sales to shop now</h2> 
<p> <core-commerce id="2c2dd5918779479da72a5ea5c6325c17" data-type="product-list" data-original-url="https://www.amazon.com/Apple-iPad-11-inch-Display-All-Day/dp/B0DZ75TN5F/"></core-commerce></p> 
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:3;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0DZ74YQ1V&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=82258c4a-af66-438c-9f2b-8b8eb70bc6d3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Apple+iPad+Air+%2811-inch%2C+M3%29+for+%24449+%28%24150+off%29%3A&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAcw4zKOcSW7H0rcL63sPpwbPfIxaOItKfFFFEqo5eQXq&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fdp%2FB0DZ74YQ1V%2F" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0DZ74YQ1V/"><strong>Apple iPad Air (11-inch, M3) for $449 ($150 off):</strong></a> The only major difference between the latest iPad Air and the previous generation is the addition of the faster M3 chip. We awarded the new slab an <a data-i13n="cpos:4;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/mobile/tablets/ipad-air-m3-review-a-modest-update-thats-still-easy-to-recommend-130045196.html">89 in our review</a>, appreciating the fact that the M3 chip was about 16 percent faster in benchmark tests than the M2. This is the iPad to get if you want a reasonable amount of productivity out of an iPad that's more affordable than the Pro models.</p> <span id="end-legacy-contents"></span> 
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:5;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0DLBTPDCS&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=82258c4a-af66-438c-9f2b-8b8eb70bc6d3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Apple+Mac+mini+%28M4%29+for+%24499+%24100+off%29%3A&amp;custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwRExCVFBEQ1M_dGFnPWdkZ3QwYy0yMCIsImNvbnRlbnRVdWlkIjoiODIyNThjNGEtYWY2Ni00MzhjLTlmMmItOGI4ZWI3MGJjNmQzIiwib3JpZ2luYWxVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwRExCVFBEQ1MiLCJkeW5hbWljQ2VudHJhbFRyYWNraW5nSWQiOnRydWUsInNpdGVJZCI6InVzLWVuZ2FkZ2V0IiwicGFnZUlkIjoiMXAtYXV0b2xpbmsiLCJmZWF0dXJlSWQiOiJ0ZXh0LWxpbmsifQ&amp;signature=AQAAAS3cTZo1Y7zMcHrrR6tbiSSapm12gLjDTQlnvkQojV2K&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fdp%2FB0DLBTPDCS" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0DLBTPDCS?th=1"><strong>Apple Mac mini (M4) for $499 $100 off):</strong></a> If you prefer desktops, the upgraded <a data-i13n="cpos:6;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/computing/apple-mac-mini-review-m4-pro-2024-shockingly-small-incredibly-powerful-140042432.html">M4 Mac mini</a> is one that won’t take up too much space, but will provide a ton of power at the same time. Not only does it come with an M4 chipset, but it also includes 16GB of RAM in the base model, plus front-facing USB-C and headphone ports for easier access.</p> 
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:7;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0B466YTT3&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=82258c4a-af66-438c-9f2b-8b8eb70bc6d3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Anker+622+5K+magnetic+power+bank+with+stand+for+%2428+%2842+percent+off%29%3A&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAcPZ2iM8gMPi5RmUJ8G_u42wk7_zjUZuuEew1I5peIu6&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FAnker-Magnetic-Upgraded-Foldable-Interstellar%2Fdp%2FB0B466YTT3" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Anker-Magnetic-Upgraded-Foldable-Interstellar/dp/B0B466YTT3?th=1"><strong>Anker 622 5K magnetic power bank with stand for $28 (42 percent off):</strong></a> This 0.5-inch thick power bank attaches magnetically to iPhones and won't get in your way when you're using your phone. It also has a built-in stand so you can watch videos, make FaceTime calls and more hands-free while your phone is powering up.</p> 
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:8;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0D7DKJ75M&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=82258c4a-af66-438c-9f2b-8b8eb70bc6d3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Anker+MagGo+10K+power+bank+%28Qi2%2C+15W%2C+ultra+slim%29+for+%2460+%2825+percent+off%29%3A&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAbkR678V_Sbfy9kWVAF2XaLHHT1Rxnwq2JFYi5MXn5hm&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FAnker-Ultra-Slim-Certified-Ultra-Fast-Compatible%2Fdp%2FB0D7DKJ75M" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Anker-Ultra-Slim-Certified-Ultra-Fast-Compatible/dp/B0D7DKJ75M?th=1"><strong>Anker MagGo 10K power bank (Qi2, 15W, ultra slim) for $60 (25 percent off):</strong></a> A 10K power bank like this is ideal if you want to be able to recharge your phone at least once fully and have extra power to spare. This one is also Qi2 compatible, providing up to 15W of power to supported phones.</p> 
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:9;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0CFDPQXN4&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=82258c4a-af66-438c-9f2b-8b8eb70bc6d3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Anker+MagGo+10K+power+bank+%28Qi2%2C+15W%29+for+%2472+%2820+percent+off%2C+Prime+exclusive%29%3A&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAARA1L4nOX3JW0MOl9GlZfxWgmkQIwJr9zFvc925Sa_3A&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FAnker-Certified-Ultra-Fast-MagSafe-Compatible-Portable%2Fdp%2FB0CFDPQXN4%2F" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Anker-Certified-Ultra-Fast-MagSafe-Compatible-Portable/dp/B0CFDPQXN4/?th=1"><strong>Anker MagGo 10K power bank (Qi2, 15W) for $72 (20 percent off, Prime exclusive):</strong></a> One of our favorite <a data-i13n="cpos:10;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/computing/accessories/best-power-bank-143048526.html">power banks</a>, this 10K brick has a built-in kickstand and a small display that shows you the battery's remaining charge.</p> 
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:11;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0DB18QHMS&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=82258c4a-af66-438c-9f2b-8b8eb70bc6d3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Anker+Soundcore+Select+4+Go+speaker+for+%2423+%2834+percent+off%29%3A&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAWm-5lgm4vbXbRVAn57lV8yAUg4G34MvX76uwkOViVnf&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fsoundcore-Bluetooth-Waterproof-Electronics-Party-Green%2Fdp%2FB0DB18QHMS" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/soundcore-Bluetooth-Waterproof-Electronics-Party-Green/dp/B0DB18QHMS?"><strong>Anker Soundcore Select 4 Go speaker for $23 (34 percent off):</strong></a> This small <a data-i13n="cpos:12;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/audio/speakers/best-portable-bluetooth-speakers-133004551.html">Bluetooth speaker</a> gets pretty loud for its size and has decent sound quality. You can pair two together for stereo sound as well, and its IP67-rated design will keep it protected against water and dust.</p> 
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:13;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0B1LVC5VZ&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=82258c4a-af66-438c-9f2b-8b8eb70bc6d3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Anker+Soundcore+Space+A40+for+%2445+%2844+percent+off%29%3A&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAASNdU8yBiYJovkjN2p02pJb4LizsmuFh7V0TbwzyOQAQ&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fdp%2FB0B1LVC5VZ%2F" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0B1LVC5VZ/"><strong>Anker Soundcore Space A40 for $45 (44 percent off):</strong></a> Our top pick for the <a data-i13n="cpos:14;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/audio/headphones/best-budget-wireless-earbuds-130028735.html">best budget wireless earbuds</a>, the Space A40 have surprisingly good ANC, good sound quality, a comfortable fit and multi-device connectivity.</p> 
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:15;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B08FJ678YK&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=82258c4a-af66-438c-9f2b-8b8eb70bc6d3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Levoit+Core+200S+smart+air+purifier+for+%2470+%28%2430+off%29%3A&amp;custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL0xFVk9JVC1QdXJpZmllci1BbGxlcmdpZXMtQ29yZS0yMDBTL2RwL0IwOEZKNjc4WUs_&amp;signature=AQAAAZv5JJbu_aqkA1DnrsJ7uHtANQlT3Y5PybFTRP3zK1Hs&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FLEVOIT-Purifier-Allergies-Core-200S%2Fdp%2FB08FJ678YK" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/LEVOIT-Purifier-Allergies-Core-200S/dp/B08FJ678YK?th=1"><strong>Levoit Core 200S smart air purifier for $70 ($30 off):</strong></a> This compact air purifier cleans the air in rooms up to 140 square feet and uses a 3-in-1 filter that removes microscopic dust, pollen and airborne particles. It has a mobile app that you can use to set runtime schedules, and it works with Alexa and Google Assistant voice commands.</p> 
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:16;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0CX4QX8RM&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=82258c4a-af66-438c-9f2b-8b8eb70bc6d3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=8BitDo+Pro+2+controller+with+travel+case+for+%2440+%2834+percent+off%2C+Prime+exclusive%29%3A&amp;custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2dwL3Byb2R1Y3QvQjBDWDRRWDhSTS8_&amp;signature=AQAAAVfDqTtSzvj5Wv1l_Sk8ayLMHZRoYS5YcpwsV0YPqENU&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fgp%2Fproduct%2FB0CX4QX8RM%2F" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0CX4QX8RM/?"><strong>8BitDo Pro 2 controller with travel case for $40 (34 percent off, Prime exclusive):</strong></a> We generally love 8BitDo controllers, and the Pro 2 has been one of our favorites for a long time. This model works with Switch 2, Steam Deck, Android and more, plus it has Hall Effect joysticks and a slew of customization options.</p> 
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:17;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0DT2344N3&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=82258c4a-af66-438c-9f2b-8b8eb70bc6d3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Beats+Powerbeats+Pro+2+for+%24200+%2820+percent+off%29%3A&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAWUvKycAcJkQ05_F0D9rE7R7iREBsNFdwYYhrRpOQa5v&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FBeats-Powerbeats-Wireless-Bluetooth-Earbuds%2Fdp%2FB0DT2344N3" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Beats-Powerbeats-Wireless-Bluetooth-Earbuds/dp/B0DT2344N3"><strong>Beats Powerbeats Pro 2 for $200 (20 percent off):</strong></a> These Beats earbuds have a hook design that will be good for anyone who wants the most secure fit while doing strenuous workouts. They also have a built-in heart rate monitor and up to 45 hours of battery life with their included charging case.</p> 
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:18;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B09BZZ3MM7&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=82258c4a-af66-438c-9f2b-8b8eb70bc6d3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Amazon+Fire+TV+Cube+for+%24100+%2829+percent+off%29%3A&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAShHBYbs9vdDMPd-kLmO4ByENIDiuMj0WSgKIijUcbAY&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FAll-new-fire-tv-cube-4k-streaming-device%2Fdp%2FB09BZZ3MM7" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/All-new-fire-tv-cube-4k-streaming-device/dp/B09BZZ3MM7?"><strong>Amazon Fire TV Cube for $100 (29 percent off):</strong></a> Amazon's most powerful streaming device, the Fire TV Cube supports 4K, HDR and Dolby Vision content, Dolby Atmos sound, Wi-Fi 6E and it has a built-in Ethernet port. It has the most internal storage of any Fire TV streaming device, plus it comes with an enhanced Alexa Voice Remote.</p> 
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:19;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0DN1PGH94&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=82258c4a-af66-438c-9f2b-8b8eb70bc6d3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Rode+Wireless+Go+III+for+%24199+%2830+percent+off%29%3A&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAWcmgbNEssv7Qv-mI_TDWfefT6-yzKbmBjcZRIkFFjae&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FR%2525252525252525C3%252525252525252598DE-Wireless-Gen-Recording-Automatic%2Fdp%2FB0DN1PGH94%2F" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/R%252525252525C3%25252525252598DE-Wireless-Gen-Recording-Automatic/dp/B0DN1PGH94/"><strong>Rode Wireless Go III for $199 (30 percent off):</strong></a> A top pick in our guide to the <a data-i13n="cpos:20;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/computing/accessories/best-mobile-microphones-for-recording-with-a-phone-154536629.html">best wireless microphones</a>, the Wireless Go III records pro-grade sound and has handy extras like onboard storage, 32-bit float and universal compatibility with iPhones, Android, cameras and PCs.</p> 
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Paramount Plus;elmt:;cpos:21;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=b0d3a482-802c-4eb1-9616-94f7490562f7&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=82258c4a-af66-438c-9f2b-8b8eb70bc6d3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Paramount+Plus&amp;linkText=Paramount%2B+Essential+for+%2430+for+one+year+%2850+percent+off%29%3A&amp;custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5wYXJhbW91bnRwbHVzLmNvbS8iLCJjb250ZW50VXVpZCI6IjgyMjU4YzRhLWFmNjYtNDM4Yy05ZjJiLThiOGViNzBiYzZkMyIsIm9yaWdpbmFsVXJsIjoiaHR0cHM6Ly93d3cucGFyYW1vdW50cGx1cy5jb20vIn0&amp;signature=AQAAAeF6wlwh2oZUa1Z25ovVlYAGKMFHzr99P_Em2pcp9fjQ&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.paramountplus.com%2F" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.paramountplus.com/"><strong>Paramount+ Essential for $30 for one year (50 percent off):</strong></a> Not technically an Amazon deal, but worth mentioning: New and returning subscribers can get half off one year of Paramount+. That brings the ad-supported Essential plan down to just $30 for the year, and the Premium plan down to $60 for the year. A subscription will give you access to NFL content on CBS and UEFA Champions League, along with shows like <em>South Park, Tulsa King, Tracker, Ghosts</em> and more. The discount runs through September 18.</p>
